duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a scalable and logical process utilizing historical data and performance standards for Flex Program capacity planning.
Monitor and report on the progress in capacity build and utilization, create performance analyses on a day-to-day basis for actionable insights.
Work cross-functionally across multiple operations functions to drive standards in capacity planning and management.
Build a strong partnership with upstream planning functions to measure, control, and respond to planning variations.
Focus on the Flex delivery partner experience in building realistic yet attainable capacity plans.
Develop and analyze operation dashboards to identify areas of opportunities and address pre-defined as well as ad-hoc business questions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (Master's preferred) in Business, Management or related field
